subject: Diving (Sports Event)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The star Canadian diver Alexandre Despatie is recovering after hitting his head on the board while practicing in Spain. He was left with a four-inch cut just below the hairline and had surgery the next day.
snippet: The star Canadian diver Alexandre Despatie is recovering after hitting his head on the board while practicing in Spain. He was left with a four-inch cut just below the hairline and had surgery the next day.
